name: Rookie Mistake
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.

rulings.text: You can't cast Rookie Mistake unless you choose two creatures as targets.
If one target creature becomes an illegal target before Rookie Mistake resolves, the other is affected as appropriate.

text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
